colorado state university in the us UNK analysed millions of hours of sound measurements from UNK sites around continental us UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the results summarised predictions of existing sound levels UNK estimates of natural sound levels UNK and the amount that human UNK made noise raises levels above natural levels UNK which is considered noise pollution UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ researchers found that human UNK made noise doubled background sound levels in 63 per cent of us protected areas UNK and caused a ten UNK fold or greater increase in background levels in 21 per cent of protected areas UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ in other words UNK noise reduced the area that natural sounds can be heard by 50 to 90 per cent UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ this also means that what could be heard at 100 feet away could only be heard from 10 to 50 feet UNK researchers said UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ this reduced capacity to hear natural sound reduces the UNK properties of spending time in nature UNK such as mood enhancement and stress reduction UNK interfering with the enjoyment typically experienced by park visitors UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK the noise levels we found can be harmful to visitor experiences in these areas UNK and can be harmful to human health UNK and to wildlife UNK said rachel UNK UNK from warner college of natural resources in the us UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK we were encouraged to see that many large wilderness areas have sound levels that are close to natural levels UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ protecting these important natural UNK resources as development and land conversion progresses is critical if we want to preserve the character of protected areas UNK she said UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ high levels of noise pollution were also found in critical habitat for endangered species UNK namely in endangered plant and insect habitats UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK although plants can not hear UNK many animals that disperse seeds or UNK flowers can hear and are known to be affected by noise UNK resulting in indirect impacts on plants UNK said UNK UNK _END_

_BEGIN_ new delhi UNK mar 19 UNK pti UNK the railways aims to cut down its water bill and save up to rs 400 crore annually with a roadmap for buying recycled water from private players UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ with the dual aim of conserving the precious resource and reducing its consumption UNK the railways will unveil its water policy UNK a first for the national transporter UNK for extensive use of treated water from water treatment plants for non UNK drinking purposes UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the indian railways water policy UNK expected to be rolled out on march 22 UNK world water day UNK will spell out the way forward for all the railway zones including colonies UNK hospitals UNK factories UNK workshops and training centres to achieve the goal of reduced consumption and increased use of recycled water UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ currently UNK the railways buys water from the states and its water bill is about rs 4 UNK 000 crore a year UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK the water policy envisages buying treated water from water treatment plants for two paise per litre UNK while we now purchase water for seven paise per litre UNK said a senior railway ministry official UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the policy has drawn out a detailed framework for setting up water treatment plants with private participation to generate an adequate amount of treated water for non UNK potable purposes UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the private players will be encouraged to set up these plants and the railways will ensure the purchase of treated water from these units UNK said the official UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the water policy also envisages the revival of all the defunct water bodies on railway land across the country UNK various ways of UNK groundwater UNK including rainwater harvesting in all railway buildings UNK _END_

chief of army staff gen qamar javed bajwa confirmed his death sentence awarded by fgcm UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK the military court was not closed to outsiders UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ kulbhushan jadhav was not given consular access as demanded by indian authorities UNK pakistan maintained that providing a defending officer during his trial at the field general court martial as per legal provisions of the military court of pakistan was enough defence for kulbhushan jadhav UNK options before kulbhushan UNK military courts of pakistan have unbridled rights and unmatched jurisdiction UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ they have the right to try civilians for several crimes UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the government can also transfer cases to the military courts of pakistan UNK the pakistan government gave an extension to the military courts of pakistan after the december 2015 terror attack on a peshawar school UNK interestingly UNK the military courts of pakistan do not have trained judges or judges with any kind of mandatory legal training UNK according to existing laws in pakistan UNK the military court convicts cannot appeal in a civilian court UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ this means the possibility of a fair trial is _BEGIN_ computer method tells time according to person UNK s body clock _END_
_BEGIN_ washington UNK feb 28 UNK pti UNK scientists have developed a novel computer method called zeitzeiger that uses a sample of blood to accurately predict circadian time UNK the time of day according to a persons body clock UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK our study demonstrates a method for predicting a persons internal time of day that could eventually be used to help diagnose and monitor circadian UNK and sleep UNK related disorders UNK and also to UNK treatments UNK said jake hughey from UNK university in the us UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK this is the first study to use genome UNK wide expression data from many individuals to develop a UNK of the circadian clock in human blood UNK hughey said UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK previous efforts to monitor the circadian clock in human tissues were based on a small number of individuals and UNK or a small set of pre UNK selected genes UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ our method UNK zeitzeiger UNK uses 15 genes from across the human genome to predict circadian time UNK he said UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the researchers were surprised to find that 13 out of these 15 genes were not core genes of the human circadian clock UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ core genes are necessary for the generation and regulation of circadian rhythms UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ they can be compared to the gears of a mechanical watch UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK most of the genes that were selected for zeitzeiger seem to be UNK of the clock UNK that is they are not the gears controlling the clock UNK but the hands telling the time UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ UNK this shows that when given data for almost every gene in the genome UNK the algorithm can figure out which set of genes gives the best predictions UNK even if they are not core clock genes UNK hughey said UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ in addition to predicting circadian time UNK the researchers demonstrated that zeitzeiger can also be used to show how disruptions to sleep UNK wake and light UNK dark cycles affect the circadian clock UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ the rhythms produced by the circadian clock differ widely between individuals at any given time of day and they are often disrupted by modern environments UNK for example due to shift work or reduced exposure to sunlight UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ circadian dysfunction is linked to conditions such as cancer UNK UNK disorder and obesity UNK _END_ _BEGIN_ knowledge of an individuals circadian rhythms could be used to optimise the timing of therapeutic interventions UNK which is known as UNK UNK _END_
